EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Munich_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place on Tuesday the 4th of July at Allianz. We look forward to seeing you soon.
Date: Tuesday, 4 July 2017 {{my.Save the Date Munich:default=edit me}}
Time:
8.30am - 1.15pm Strategy Session 1.15pm - 5.15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
Allianz SE KÃ¶niginstrasse 95, 80802 Munich, Building E, Conference Room E 04 22+23 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/K%C3%B6niginstra%C3%9Fe+95,+80802+M%C3%BCnchen,+Germany/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x479e75be18365515:0xb12b013be8413a01?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjBiK6VldzUAhWIKGMKHRNgBIoQ8gEIJTAA]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/munich?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Hinada Neiron at hneiron@pivotal.io <[[mailto:hneiron@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
